ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros
ygData.msgSnippet: It works best in places where you don t have two mobs to charm or cannot afford stuff to be running around for one reason or another.  I did find it more
ygData.messageBody:
It works best in places where you don't have two mobs to charm or cannot
afford stuff to be running around for one reason or another. I did find it
more effective than non-charm kiting due to the fact the DoT did full damage
the whole time. Charm kiting would still be more effective where possible.
The DoT seemed to prevent the charmed mob from healing at a faster rate.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 03, 2000 1:51 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Macros


if you had a sow and a wide open area this would hardly be the best way to
kill stuff.

At 07:19 PM 10/3/00 +0000, you wrote:
>Just get a SOW and a wide open area and you would be smoking. At least
>until Abashi hears about it.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
